title: Which is the hottest technology to learn for a person with 10+ years experience in IT? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would say all 3 that the posters above have mentioned as they correlate with each other. Big Data is the newest commodity (companies are paying silly money to know anything and everything about you.)ML will take some time as it inherently is still learning from human input for parameters. (Humans can and will still make mistakes, time will tell if ML can mitigate human error).Security. Goes without saying really.

I know quite a number of people with 5–10+ years of experience and many of them were learning Machine Learning as it is the future. One person was interested in cloud computing and another in Big data. When asked me I would say Machine Learning, infact having no experience in development i am learning ML too. All the best
